      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: right" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item
1</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><img src="abn_header.jpg" alt=""></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Amsterdam</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">30 September</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> 2009</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> AMRO </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">file</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">s</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> legal demerger documentation with the
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Amsterdam</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> Chamber of Commerce</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
has today filed documentation with the Amsterdam Chamber of Commerce for a legal
demerger in The Netherlands and in Belgium. The demerger proposals outline the
legal process for the transfer of the majority of the Dutch State acquired
businesses into a separate legal entity, which will remain wholly owned by ABN
AMRO Holding N.V. until it is legally transferred out of ABN AMRO
Group.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The demerger
proposals (excluding the description of assets and liabilities) and pro forma
financial information as of 31 December 2008 and 30 June 2009 reflecting the
impact of the legal transfers and demergers on ABN AMRO Bank N.V. are available
on the ABN AMRO&#8217;s website (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">www.abnamro.com</font>).&#160;&#160;The
complete demerger filing, including a description of assets and liabilities to
be transferred, is available for consultation at the Amsterdam Chamber of
Commerce.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Holding
N.V. was acquired by a consortium of banks through RFS Holdings B.V. on 17
October 2007. The consortium consisted of The Royal Bank of Scotland Group
(38%), Fortis Bank (34%) and Banco Santander SA (28%). On 24 December 2008 the
Fortis Bank Nederland (Holding) N.V. stake in RFS Holdings B.V. was transferred
to the Dutch State, following the acquisition by the Dutch State in October 2008
of Fortis Bank Nederland (Holding) N.V., including its stake in RFS Holdings
B.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Group has
chosen a two-step approach to effect the legal separation of the assets and
liabilities acquired by the Dutch State:</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div>
          <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
              <tr valign="top">
                <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                  <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
                </td>
                <td>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Step 1</font> - &#8220;Legal
      Demerger&#8221;: Transferring the majority of the Dutch State acquired
      businesses from ABN AMRO Bank N.V. to a new legal entity, ABN AMRO II
      N.V.&#160;&#160;Some subsidiaries and assets and liabilities are
      separately transferred to the new legal entity, mostly before the planned
      legal demerger date.&#160;&#160;Following the demergers and the transfer
      of the Dutch State acquired businesses into the new bank, the existing ABN
      AMRO Bank N.V. will be renamed The Royal Bank of Scotland
      N.V.&#160;&#160;The new legal entity comprising the Dutch State acquired
      businesses will then be renamed ABN AMRO Bank
  N.V.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div>
          <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
              <tr valign="top">
                <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                  <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
                </td>
                <td>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Step 2</font> - &#8220;Legal
      Separation&#8221;: Transferring the shares of the renamed ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
      from ABN AMRO Holding N.V. to a new holding company fully owned by the
      Dutch State and independent of ABN AMRO Holding N.V. (which will be
      renamed RBS Holdings N.V.)</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Until legal
separation ABN AMRO Group will continue to be governed by the ABN AMRO Holding
N.V. Managing Board and Supervisory Board and regulated on a consolidated basis
with capital adequacy, liquidity measures and exposures being reported to and
regulated by the Dutch Central Bank.&#160;&#160;ABN AMRO capital ratios continue
to exceed the minimum tier 1 and total capital ratios of 9% and 12.5%
respectively (as set by the Dutch Central Bank during the separation period of
ABN AMRO Group) and are adequate to cover for stress scenarios.&#160;&#160;ABN
AMRO Group continues to comfortably exceed the regulatory liquidity
requirements.&#160;&#160;ABN AMRO Group and its shareholders have plans in place
to ensure that at legal separation each individual bank is adequately
capitalized and has a sound liquidity position.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            </div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Further
information on the legal demerger is available on the following Intranet
links</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">ABN AMRO Bank N.V. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">demerger proposals (excluding the
description of assets and liabilities) and pro forma financial information:
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #0000ff; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">http://www.abnamro.com/pressroom/pressreleasedetail.cfm?ReleaseID=412432</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
issued debt instruments allocation please refer to: </font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">http://<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #0000ff; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">www.group.abnamro.com/financials/allocation.cfm</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Update on
Separation: <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">http://www.group.abnamro.com/transition/transition.cfm</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">For
further information, please contact</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 33pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN AMRO Bank N.V.</font></font></div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Pro forma financial information at 30
June 2009</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">included in the demerger proposals for
the Dutch and Belgian transfer of assets and liabilities to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">1082 PP&#160;&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Amsterdam</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Trade register

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">30 September 2009</font></font></div>

                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Pro forma
      Company Equity Statement ABN AMRO Bank N.V. at 30 June

                </td>
                <td align="right" valign="top" width="10%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">7</font></div>
                </td>

              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;
    </font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="80%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Notes to the
      pro forma financial information ABN AMRO Bank N.V.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="right" valign="top" width="10%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">8</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="80%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Supplementary
      information ABN AMRO Bank N.V.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="right" valign="top" width="10%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">10</font></div>
                </td>

      financial information on the acquiring company ABN AMRO II
      N.V.</font></div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">2</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">General</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
has filed a demerger proposal, of which this document forms part, for the legal
demerger of parts of the Dutch State acquired businesses to ABN AMRO II N.V. The
legal demergers are performed in two legal demerger processes, both under Dutch
law: a demerger of assets and liabilities in the Netherlands referred to as the
Dutch demerger, and a demerger of assets and liabilities in Belgium referred to
as the Belgian demerger. The demerger proposal also includes the transfer of a
number of selected subsidiaries and, alternatively, the transfer of the
beneficial title of certain businesses, from ABN AMRO Bank N.V. to ABN AMRO II
N.V. prior to the demergers.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The purpose of this
document is to provide creditors of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. and ABN AMRO II N.V. with
pro forma financial information allowing an assessment, before and after legal
transfers and demergers, of the impact of the (legal) transfers and demergers on
ABN AMRO Bank N.V. and on ABN AMRO II N.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The pro forma
information includes (i) a pro forma Company Income Statement for the year ended
2008, (ii) a pro forma Company Balance Sheet at 30 June 2009, (iii) a pro forma
Company Equity Statement at 30 June 2009 and (iv) Notes and Supplementary
Information for both ABN AMRO Bank N.V., the demerging company and ABN AMRO II
N.V., the acquiring company.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">For information in
respect of the financial position of ABN AMRO Holding N.V., the parent company
of ABN AMRO Bank N.V., reference is made to the interim financial report dated
26 August 2009 and to the 2008 annual report, available on the ABN AMRO website
(www.abnamro.com).</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The ABN AMRO
Holding N.V. interim financial report provides information on the externally
reported segments, including the Dutch State acquired businesses. The major part
of these Dutch State acquired businesses are proposed to be legally demerged and
transferred in accordance with this proposal to ABN AMRO II N.V., also a fully
owned subsidiary of ABN AMRO Holding N.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The interim
financial report also provides information on the capital and liquidity position
of ABN AMRO Holding N.V., that has provided a guarantee to both ABN AMRO Bank
N.V. and to ABN AMRO II N.V. until the latter is legally separated from ABN AMRO
Group.&#160;&#160;ABN AMRO Group continues to be well funded and capitalised.
The Group&#8217;s capital ratios continue to exceed the minimum tier 1 and total
capital ratios of 9% and 12.5% respectively as set by the Dutch Central Bank
during the transition and separation period of ABN AMRO Group. ABN AMRO Group
continues to comfortably exceed the regulatory liquidity
requirements.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">RBS and the Dutch
State continue to work towards the legal separation of the Dutch State acquired
businesses from the residual RBS acquired businesses into two separate viable
banks, each with its own banking license, applications for which have been
submitted to the Dutch Central Bank, and each adequately capitalised at the time
of separation.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Legal demerger will
occur upon transfer of the Dutch State acquired businesses out of ABN AMRO Bank
N.V., the demerging entity, into a separate legal entity ABN AMRO II N.V., a
fully owned subsidiary of ABN AMRO Holding N.V. that was incorporated and
registered with the Dutch Chamber of Commerce earlier in 2009.&#160;&#160;Legal
separation out of the ABN AMRO Group will occur when ABN AMRO II N.V. is
separated from ABN AMRO Group and functions as a new independent bank. This is
aimed to be achieved a few months after the legal demerger has been
effected.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Until final legal
separation ABN AMRO Group will continue to be governed by the ABN AMRO Holding
N.V. Managing Board and Supervisory Board and regulated on a consolidated basis
with capital ratios, liquidity measures and exposures being reported to and
regulated by the Dutch Central Bank. All steps in the legal demerger and
separation process are subject to approval of the Dutch Central
Bank.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">3</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Pro forma financial information on the
demerging company </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">General</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
is a wholly owned subsidiary of ABN AMRO Holding N.V., which has fully and
unconditionally guaranteed the obligations of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. that have been
incurred. This guarantee includes all securities issued by ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
ABN AMRO Bank N.V. <font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">is a limited
liability company incorporated under the laws of the Netherlands and has its
statutory seat in Amsterdam, the Netherlands and its registered office at Gustav
Mahlerlaan 10, 1082 PP Amsterdam, the Netherlands. </font>ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">is registered with the Trade
Register of the Chambers of Commerce under number 33002587.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
utilizes an exemption in the Dutch and United States regulation and therefore
does not prepare, nor file a full set of financial statements, including
consolidated financial statements in the Netherlands or with the US Securities
Exchange Commission. In the 2008 Annual Report of ABN AMRO Holding N.V.
condensed consolidating financial information for (i) ABN AMRO Holding N.V., on
a standalone basis as guarantor; (ii) ABN AMRO Bank N.V. on a standalone basis;
(iii) other subsidiaries of ABN AMRO Holding N.V. on a combined basis; (iv)
consolidation adjustments; and total consolidated amounts are presented on the
pages 211 to 217. Abbreviated Company Financial Statements of ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
for the year 2008 have been filed with the Chamber of Commerce on 8 July 2009
and are included as appendices to this pro forma financial
information.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Following the
transfer of selected entities into ABN AMRO II N.V. and the Dutch demerger of
assets and liabilities to ABN AMRO II N.V., ABN AMRO Bank N.V. will be renamed
to The Royal Bank of Scotland N.V. (hereafter &#8220;RBS N.V.&#8221;). For RBS N.V. an
application for a renewal of the existing banking license has been
filed.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Basis for
Presentation</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">As more than six
months have passed since the last financial year of ABN AMRO Bank N.V., 2008,
for which financial statements have been adopted, interim financial statements
have been prepared for ABN AMRO Bank N.V., the demerging company. The pro forma
financial information prepared includes a pro forma income statement, a pro
forma balance sheet and a pro forma statement of equity reflecting the 2008
results and the financial positions at 30 June 2009 on a pro forma basis and
including the impact of the demergers and other transactions planned prior to
the demergers of ABN AMRO Bank N.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Bank
N.V.'s financial position at 30 June 2009 and the 2008 income statement do not
include all of the information required for annual financial statements under
International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) issued by the International
Accounting Standards Board (IASB), as adopted by the European Union and also do
not include all information required for interim financial statements complying
with IAS 34 &#8216;Interim financial statements&#8217;.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">In preparing the
pro forma financial information, the same accounting principles and methods of
computation were applied as in the consolidated financial statements of ABN AMRO
Holding N.V. for the year ended 31 December 2008, which include the financial
information of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. on a fully consolidated basis. Please refer to
pages 99 to 118 of ABN AMRO Holding N.V.&#8217;s 2008 Annual Report for the
description of the accounting policies.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The pro forma
income statement only includes the results from continuing operations; the
results from discontinued operations are not reflected, as these results relate
to businesses that have already been transferred out of ABN AMRO Group.</font><a name="bmkStart"><br></a></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger

          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">Pro

                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(13,463</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">)</font>&#160;</font></font></td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">*The Income Statement has not been
affected by the capital actions</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">

              <tr valign="bottom">
                <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="34%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Risk weighted assets</font></font>&#160;</font></font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">165,437</font></td>
                <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(48,709</font></td>
                <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">)&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(45,687</font></td>
                <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">)&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">71,040</font></td>
                <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">(1,428</font></td>
                <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">)&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr valign="bottom">
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="34%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Nominal value per share (in Euro)</font>&#160;</font></font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font size="1" style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">4.50</font></font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
