            <hr style="COLOR: #009999" align="center" noshade size="3" width="100%">&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">&#160;</div><a name="bmkStart" /></div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">7</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Notes to the pro forma financial
information ABN AMRO Bank N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">1</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Transfers</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The column &#8220;Transfers and capital
actions&#8221; includes the effect of the transfer of certain subsidiaries (or
businesses) and branches including certain Private Clients and International
Diamonds &amp; Jewellery Group business activities from </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. as part of the
restructuring prior to the date of the legal demerger of materially all Dutch
State acquired businesses in </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Prior to the Dutch and Belgian
demergers, selected subsidiaries of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. will be transferred to
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. These subsidiaries will be
transferred at net asset value to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. in exchange for promissory
notes which will be distributed in kind by </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V. prior to the date of
the legal demerger from ABN AMRO Bank N.V. The equivalent value in equity will
be invested by </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V. in </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. in accordance with the
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V.&#8217;s accounting policy
in respect of common control transactions. The transactions relate to
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Private Clients Holding B.V.,
including most of the international private clients activities incorporated in
subsidiaries of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V., New HBU II N.V., Delta
Lloyd </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Verzekeringen Holding B.V.
including the joint venture with Delta Lloyd and Amstel Lease Maatschappij
N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">As to New HBU II
N.V., alternatively, rather than selling and transferring the shares in this
company, it is also being considered to have New HBU II N.V. legally merged into
ABN AMRO Bank N.V.&#160;&#160;It is additionally being considered to, prior to
this merger, sell and transfer the beneficial title (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">economische gerechtigdheid</font>)
to its entire business or ABN AMRO Bank N.V.&#8217;s interest therein, to ABN AMRO II
N.V. in exchange for a receivable and subsequently distribute such receivable to
ABN AMRO Holding N.V. prior to the demerger becoming effective. This alternative
restructuring of New HBU II N.V. is considered in order to ease a potential
later sales process to comply with the requirements of the European Commission.
The pro forma financial information does not reflect this alternative
structuring.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><br><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">2</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Capital actions</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">On 2 July, 2009 the Dutch Parliament
approved the Ministry of Finance of the Netherlands plans to acquire a EUR 800
million Mandatory Convertible Tier-1 Security (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">MCS</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">) to be issued by </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. This Security was issued
on </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">31 July 2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> by ABN AMRO Bank N.V. At the time of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. transferring out of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V., the security will
mandatorily convert into common equity of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #1b1c20; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The Mandatory Convertible Tier-1
Security pays a 10% coupon. ABN AMRO Bank N.V. may defer coupons at any time. In
case ABN AMRO Bank N.V. is in breach of minimum capital adequacy requirements,
as set by Dutch Central Bank, coupon payments must be
deferred.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Furthermore, the Dutch Parliament has on
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">2 July 2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> approved that the Ministry of Finance
of the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Netherlands</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> enters into a Credit Default Swap
agreement with </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. This agreement has been
signed on </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">31 July
2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> and became effective
on </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">31 August
2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">. Through this
arrangement </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. has purchased credit
protection, for a fee of 51.5 bps p.a. on the outstanding portfolio amount,
currently EUR 34.5 billion of own originated residential mortgages. Under the
agreement losses will be shared pari passu between </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. for 5% and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> for 95%, with a first loss for
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. of 20 bps p.a. This
credit default swap will reduce the risk-weighted assets of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. by EUR 19
billion.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">8</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #1b1c20; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">If required to maintain the solvency
ratios as set by the Dutch Central Bank, ABN AMRO Holding N.V. will inject
further capital into ABN AMRO Bank N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #1b1c20; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The effects of the above capital actions
on ABN AMRO Bank N.V. are reflected in the pro forma financial information under
&#8220;Transfers and capital actions&#8221;.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">3</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Guarantee from </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Following the transfer of the selected
subsidiaries (or businesses) as part of the structuring of the demerger
transaction, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. enters into a guarantee
transaction with </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. to guarantee approximately
EUR 15 </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">b</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">illion of assets. The impact of this
transaction is the equivalent of a positive EUR 1.1 billion Tier 1 capital for
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. and an equivalent
negative EUR 1.4 billion of Tier 1 capital for </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. The reason for this
transaction is to ensure continuing adequate capitalisation of ABN AMRO Bank
N.V. following the transfer of subsidiaries (or businesses) noted under (1)
above and before the legal demerger is effected.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The effect of this guarantee on
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. is also reflected in the
pro forma financial information as &#8220;Transfers and capital
actions&#8221;.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">4</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Dividend proposal</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Subject to regulatory approval, the
Managing Board of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. has proposed and the
Supervisory Board has approved the payment of a dividend of EUR 6.5 billion, to
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V. to enable
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V. to pay a dividend of
EUR 6.5 billion to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">RFS</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> Holdings B.V. for capital repatriation
to its shareholder Banco Santander S.A., relating to realised proceeds from the
2008 sale of the Santander acquired businesses</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20; FONT-STYLE: italic">. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The effect of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">approved dividend payment has been
reflected as &#8220;Transfers and capital actions&#8221; in the pro forma financial
information.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">5</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Dutch demerger</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Materially all of the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Netherlands</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> parts of the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> acquired businesses will be transferred
to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. in a legal demerger (with
the exception of the transfer of the four subsidiaries (or businesses) referred
to above in note 1 Transfers).</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Insofar </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">as </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">and to the extent that the legal
ownership of any asset</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">s</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">liabilities, rights, obligations or
legal relationships </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">reflected in the description attached to
the Demerger Proposal </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">can</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">not be transferred </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">by means of a legal demerger
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> AMRO II N.V. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">due to governing law or contractual
constraints</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, then the
econo</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">mic ownership of those
assets, liabilities, rights, obligations and legal relationships will to the
greatest extent possible transfer to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> AMRO II N.V. pursuant to the legal
demerger. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The effects of
the legal demerger and the transfer of economic ownership on the financial
figures are reflected as &#8220;Dutch demerger</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#8220;.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">6</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Pro forma </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Bank </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">N.V. after Dutch
demerger</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">This pro forma financial information
represents the financial figures of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V., after the effects of
transfers, capital actions and the Dutch demerger but before the Belgian
demerger, including the intercompany elimination effects.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The 2008 income statement of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. includes results related
to the transition of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V. that are not expected
to reoccur in the future. Reference is made to the 2008 Annual Report of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V. to Section 2
Operating Review for an analysis of the 2008 results of </font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">9</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V. The pro forma income
statement has not been adjusted to exclude the effects from any non-recurring
items.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">7</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Belgian demerger</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The legal demerger of the Belgian
Private Clients and International Diamonds &amp; Jewellery Group business is
executed in a separate demerger process, with separate legal documentation under
Dutch law. This demerger is executed after the demerger of the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Netherlands</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> business. The effects of this legal
demerger on the financial figures are reflected as &#8220;Belgian demerger&#8221; and
include a capital injection of EUR 15 million in the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Belgium</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> branch.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">8</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Pro forma </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The pro forma financial information
represents the financial figures of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V., after the effects of
transfers, capital actions and both legal demerger transactions, including the
intercompany elimination effects.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Supplementary information ABN AMRO Bank
N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Cross liability</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Under article 2:334t of the Dutch Civil
Code, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V., after legal demerger,
</font>will remain liable to the creditors which transferred from ABN AMRO Bank
N.V. to ABN AMRO II N.V. in the event that ABN AMRO II N.V. cannot meet its
obligation to those creditors.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The liability relates only to
obligations existing at the date of legal demerger. The liability will cease to
exist upon expiration of the obligations. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V.'s liability is limited
to the equity retained at legal demerger, amounting to EUR 2,487 million in the
pro forma financial information.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. has put in place
arrangements to mitigate the risks of the liability to the creditors which
transferred from </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. will hold the regulatory
capital agreed with the Dutch Central Bank for any residual
risks.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Similarly under
Article 2:334t of the Dutch Civil Code, ABN AMRO Bank N.V. is under certain
circumstances liable to the creditors which have transferred from ABN AMRO Bank
N.V. to New HBU II N.V. on 7 August 2008. This liability amounts to
approximately EUR 1.9 billion at 30 June 2009. The alternative restructuring of
New HBU II N.V. as described in note 1 could eliminate this
liability.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">RBS Asset Protection
Scheme</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Her Majesty's Treasury in the
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">United Kingdom</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> intends to enter into an agreement with
The Royal Bank of Scotland Plc on guaranteeing losses on certain identified RBS
acquired assets of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Group. A part of the assets relate
to assets held by ABN AMRO Bank N.V., which are not included in the demerger or
transfer process. The agreement with the UK Treasury does not impact
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V., however The Royal Bank
of Scotland Plc intends to enter into a guarantee agreement with </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. for the same identified
assets. The potential impact of this intended guarantee agreement on the risk
weighted assets of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. is not included in this
pro forma financial information.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">10</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Entities and assets and liabilities not
part of demerger</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. will, after the
transfers and Dutch and Belgian demergers, continue to include assets and
liabilities that have not yet been allocated to, or divided up between the
consortium shareholders, the so-called &#8220;Shared Assets&#8221;, in which each of the
consortium shareholders has an indirect interest. The net asset value of these
assets and liabilities amounts to EUR 6,748 million negative at </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">30 June </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">. In</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> the legal demerger, capital related to
the demerged and transferred businesses will demerge and capital for the
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> interest in the Shared Assets will
remain in </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Furthermore a number of assets and
liabilities included in some Private Clients and International Diamonds &amp;
Jewellery Group businesses in branches and subsidiaries of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. in </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">South Africa</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">India</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">USA</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Gibraltar</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">United Kingdom</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">China</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> are not part of the transfers or the
demergers. These will be transferred to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V., as soon as possible after
the effective date of the demerger, when all required technical and regulatory
separation activities are completed and approvals have been obtained, while some
minor activities of these businesses will be discontinued and will therefore not
transfer to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. T</font>he International
Diamonds &amp; Jewellery Group activities, included in the Japan branch that in
July 2009 transferred to The Royal Bank of Scotland Plc, will also at a later
stage be transferred to ABN AMRO II N.V.<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The total 2008 operating revenue of
these entities amounts to EUR 82 million and the total assets EUR 823 million at
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">30 June 2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #1b1c20; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Any structured transaction related
assets and liabilities, for which approval from a third party is necessary but
will not be obtained prior to the legal demerger, are not part of the transfers
and demergers, but will be separately transferred as soon as approvals are
available. The economic ownership will however, to the greatest extent possible
transfer to ABN AMRO II N.V. pursuant to the legal demerger.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #1b1c20; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN AMRO Bank N.V. and ABN AMRO II N.V.
reached agreements on the principles for the availability for ABN AMRO II N.V.
of the security rights connected with client relationships to be demerged to ABN
AMRO II N.V.</font></font><br>&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">

          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">11</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">

          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Pro forma financial information on the
acquiring company </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">General</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO II N.V. is
a limited liability company incorporated on 9 April 2009 under the laws of the
Netherlands and has its statutory seat in Amsterdam, the Netherlands and its
registered office at Gustav Mahlerlaan 10, 1082 PP Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
ABN AMRO II N.V. is registered with the Trade Register of the Chambers of
Commerce under number 34334259.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO II N.V.,
the acquiring company, is a wholly owned subsidiary of ABN AMRO Holding N.V.,
which has fully and unconditionally guaranteed the obligations of ABN AMRO II
N.V. that have been incurred<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.
</font>As a result of the guarantee received from ABN AMRO Holding N.V., ABN
AMRO II N.V. is exempt from preparing a full set of financial statements. The
guarantee for ABN AMRO II N.V. will be withdrawn at legal separation of ABN AMRO
II N.V. out of ABN AMRO Group.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Following the
transfer of selected entities into ABN AMRO II N.V. and the Dutch demerger of
assets and liabilities to ABN AMRO II N.V., ABN AMRO II N.V. will be renamed to
ABN AMRO Bank N.V. ABN AMRO II N.V. has applied for a banking license with the
Dutch Central Bank. The confirmation of the banking license is expected in due
course.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">After the transfers
and the Dutch and Belgian demerger of assets and liabilities, ABN AMRO II N.V.
materially comprises the Dutch State acquired businesses in ABN AMRO Holding
N.V., which include materially all of the activities in the Netherlands, with
the exception of the RBS acquired Global Markets and Global Clients businesses
in the Netherlands, and also include the international Private Clients and <font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">International Diamonds &amp; Jewellery
Group</font> activities. Some of the Private Clients and <font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">International Diamonds &amp; Jewellery
Group</font> activities included in international branches in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">South Africa</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">India</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">United States</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Gibraltar</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">United Kingdom</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">China</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> w</font>ill be transferred to ABN AMRO
II N.V. as soon as possible after the effective date of demerger after
completion of all required license and regulatory approvals, or will be
discontinued. The International Diamonds &amp; Jewellery Group activities
included in the Japan branch that in July 2009 transferred to The Royal Bank of
Scotland Plc will at a later stage be transferred to ABN AMRO II N.V. These
activities are not significant.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Basis for
Presentation</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The first financial
year since incorporation has not yet passed and therefore an interim balance
sheet and a statement of equity have been prepared at 30 June 2009.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The pro forma
financial information prepared include a 2008 pro forma income statement, a pro
forma balance sheet and a pro forma statement of equity reflecting the financial
positions at 30 June 2009 on a pro forma basis including i) the impact of the
demerger and ii) other transactions planned prior to the demerger of ABN AMRO
Bank N.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO II N.V.'s
financial position at 30 June 2009 and the income statement on a pro forma basis
do not include all of the information required for annual financial statements
under International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) issued by the
International Accounting Standards Board, as adopted by the European Union and
also do not include all information required for interim financial statements
complying with IAS 34 &#8216;Interim financial statements&#8217;.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">In preparing the
pro forma financial information, the same accounting principles and methods of
computation were applied as in the consolidated financial statements of ABN AMRO
Holding N.V. for the year ended at 31 December 2008, which include the financial
information of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. on a </font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">fully consolidated
basis. Please refer to pages 99 to 118 of ABN AMRO Holding N.V.&#8217;s 2008 Annual
Report for the description of the accounting policies.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The pro forma
income statement only includes the results from continuing operations; the
results from discontinued operations are not reflected, as these results relate
to businesses that have already been transferred out of ABN AMRO
Group.</font><br>&#160;</div>

            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger

          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">Pro
forma Company Income Statement ABN AMRO II N.V. for the year ended 31 December
2008</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

                  </td>
                  <td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">**</font></font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td>
                    <div align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The Income
      Statement has not been affected by the capital
  actions</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
        </div>
