      Capital</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">0.045</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">-</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">500</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">500</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">-</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">500</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="34%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Shareholders'
      equity</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">0.045</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">2,628</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">1,920</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">4,548</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">15</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 4px double"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">4,563</font></td>
                  <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
          <div align="left">&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">
            <hr style="COLOR: #009999" align="center" noshade size="3" width="100%">&#160;</div>
        </div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">16</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Notes to the pro forma financial
information ABN AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">1</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Transfers</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The column &#8220;Transfers and capital
actions&#8221; includes the effects of the transfer of certain subsidiaries (or
businesses) and branches including certain Private Clients and International
Diamonds &amp; Jewellery Group business activities from </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. as part of the
restructuring prior to the date of the legal demerger of materially all Dutch
State acquired businesses to ABN AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Prior to the Dutch and Belgian
demergers, selected subsidiaries of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. will be transferred to
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. These subsidiaries will be
transferred at net asset value to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. in exchange of promissory
notes which will subsequently be distributed in kind by </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V. prior to the legal
demerger. The equivalent value in equity will be invested by </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V. in </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. in accordance with
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding&#8217;s accounting policy in
respect of common control transactions. The transactions relate to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Private Clients Holding B.V.,
including most of the international private clients activities incorporated in
subsidiaries of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V., New HBU II N.V., Delta
Lloyd </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Verzekeringen Holding B.V.
including the joint venture with Delta Lloyd and Amstel Lease Maatschappij
N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">As to New HBU II
N.V., alternatively, rather than selling and transferring the shares in this
company, it is also being considered to have New HBU II N.V. legally merged into
ABN AMRO Bank N.V.&#160;&#160;It is additionally being considered to, prior to
this merger, sell and transfer the beneficial title (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">economische gerechtigdheid</font>)
to its entire business or ABN AMRO Bank N.V.&#8217;s interest therein, to ABN AMRO II
N.V. in exchange for a receivable and subsequently distribute such receivable to
ABN AMRO Holding N.V. prior to the demerger becoming effective. This alternative
restructuring of New HBU II N.V. is considered in order to ease a potential
later sales process to comply with the requirements of the European Commission.
The pro forma financial information does not reflect this alternative
structuring.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Capital
actions</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">On 2 July, 2009 the Dutch Parliament
approved the Ministry of Finance of the Netherlands plans to acquire a EUR 800
million Mandatory Convertible Tier-1 Security (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">MCS</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">) to be issued by </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. This Security was issued
on </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">31 July 2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> by </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. At the time of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. transferring out of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V., the security will
mandatorily convert into common equity of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The Mandatory Convertible Tier-1
Security pays a 10% coupon. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. may defer coupons at any
time. In case </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. is in breach of minimum
capital adequacy requirements, as set by Dutch Central Bank, coupon payments
must be deferred.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Furthermore, the Dutch Parliament has on
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">2 July 2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> approved that the Ministry of Finance
of the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Netherlands</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> enters into a Credit Default Swap
agreement with </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. This agreement has been
signed on </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">31 July
2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> and became effective
on </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">31 August
2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">. Through this
arrangement </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. has purchased credit
protection, for a fee of 51.5 basis points per annum on the outstanding
portfolio amount, currently EUR 34.5 billion of own originated residential
mortgages. Under the agreement losses will be shared pari passu between
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. for 5% and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> for 95%, with a first loss for
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. of 20 basis points per
annum. This credit default swap has reduced the risk-weighted assets of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. by EUR 19
billion.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">3</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Guarantee to ABN AMRO Bank
N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Following the transfer of the selected
subsidiaries as part of the structuring of the demerger transaction,
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. enters into a guarantee
transaction with </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. to guarantee
approximately EUR </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">15</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> billion of assets. The impact of this
transaction is the equivalent of a </font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">17</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">positive EUR 1.1 billion Tier 1 capital
for </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. and an equivalent
negative EUR 1.4 billion of Tier 1 capital for </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The effect of this guarantee on
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. is also reflected in the
pro forma financial information as &#8220;Transfers and capital
actions&#8221;.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">4</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Dutch demerger</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Materially all of the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Netherlands</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> parts of the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> acquired businesses will be transferred
to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. in a legal demerger with
the exception of the transfer of the four subsidiaries (or businesses) referred
to above in note 1 Transfers.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">I</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">nsofar and to the
extent that the legal ownership of any assets</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">liabilities, rights,
obligations or legal relationships </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">can</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">not be transferred
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">by means
of a legal demerger </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">to</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000"> AMRO II N.V.
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">due to
governing law or contractual constraints</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">, then the economic
ownership of those assets, liabilities, rights, obligations and legal
relationships </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">reflected in the
Des</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">c</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">ription attached to the
Demerger Proposal </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">will to the greatest
ext</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">ent
possible transfer to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000"> AMRO II N.V. pursuant
to the legal demerger. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #1b1c20">The effects of the
legal demerger and the transfer of economic ownership on the financial figures
are reflected as &#8220;Dutch demerger&#8221;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">5</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Pro forma </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">II </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">N.V. after Dutch
demerger</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">This pro forma financial information
represents the financial figures of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V., after the effects of
transfers, capital actions and the Dutch demerger but before the Belgian
demerger, including the intercompany elimination effects.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The 2008 income statement of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. includes results related
to the transition of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Group that are not expected to
reoccur in the future. Reference is made to the 2008 Annual Report of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Group to Section 2 Operating
Review for an analysis of the 2008 results of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Group. The pro forma income
statement has not been adjusted to exclude the effects from these non-recurring
items.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">6</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Belgian demerger</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The legal demerger of the Belgian
business acquired by the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> is executed in a separate demerger
process, with separate legal documentation. This demerger is executed after the
demerger of the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Netherlands</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> business. The effects of this legal
demerger on the financial figures are reflected as &#8220;Belgian demerger&#8221; and
include a capital injection of EUR 15 million in the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Belgium</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> branch.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">7</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Pro forma </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The pro forma financial information
represents the financial figures of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V., after the effects of
transfers, capital actions and both legal demerger transactions, including the
intercompany elimination effects.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">8</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Share capital</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The authorized outstanding and issued
share capital of ABN AMRO II N.V. at incorporation on </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">9 April 2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> consists of 45 shares, each share
having a nominal value of EUR 1,000.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #1b1c20; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">At the time of the legal demerger, the
authorized outstanding share capital will be increased to 2 billion shares of
EUR 1 nominal value each.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">In exchange for the net asset value of
the Dutch demerger of EUR 1,920 million, 499,954,999 shares will be allotted by
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">In exchange for the net asset value of
the Belgian demerger of EUR 15 million, one share will be allotted by
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">18</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">A second legal demerger is being
considered to further effect the transfer of the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> acquired businesses to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. to be effected at or post
legal separation. This legal demerger relates to the demerger from </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Holding N.V. to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. of an amount of cash and
any liability pursuant to the statement as referred in section 2:403 paragraph 1
sub f of the Dutch Civil Code, including the remaining liabilities as referred
to in section 2:404 of the Dutch Civil Code, to the extent it concerns
liabilities arising out of legal acts from </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V., the demerged and
transferred subsidiaries and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. to the extent it relates
to the split-off to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. pursuant to this
demerger.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Supplementary information ABN AMRO II
N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Cross liability</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Under article 2:334t of the Dutch Civil
Code </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V., after legal demerger,
will remain liable to the creditors of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. that remain in
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V., in the event that
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. cannot meet its
obligations with those creditors.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The liability relates only to
obligations existing as at date of legal demerger. The liability will cease to
exist upon expiration of the obligations. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V.'s liability to creditors
is limited to the amount of equity acquired at legal demerger, which amounts to
EUR 1,935 million in the pro forma financial information.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. has put in place
arrangements to mitigate the risks of the liability to the creditors which
remain with </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. will hold the regulatory
capital agreed with the Dutch Central Bank for any residual
risks.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Similarly under
Article 2:334t of the Dutch Civil Code, New HBU II N.V. is under certain
circumstances liable to the creditors of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. following the
demerger from ABN AMRO Bank N.V. to new HBU II N.V. on 7 August 2008. This
liability amounts to approximately EUR 0.9 billion at 30 June 2009. The
alternative restructuring of New HBU II N.V. as described in note 1 could
eliminate this liability.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Entities and assets and liabilities not
part of demerger</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">A number of assets and liabilities
included in some Private Clients and International Diamonds &amp; Jewellery
Group businesses in branches and subsidiaries of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO Bank N.V. in </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">South Africa</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">India</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">United States</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Gibraltar</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">United Kingdom</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">China</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> are not part of the transfers and the
demergers. These will be transferred to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. as soon as possible after
the effective date of demerger, when all technical and regulatory separation
activities are completed and approvals have been obtained, while some minor
activities of these businesses will be discontinued and will therefore not
transfer to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V.&#160;&#160;T</font>he
International Diamonds &amp; Jewellery Group activities, included in the Japan
branch that in July 2009 transferred to The Royal Bank of Scotland Plc, will at
a later stage be transferred to ABN AMRO II N.V.<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The total operating revenue of these
entities amounts to EUR 82 million and the total assets EUR 823 million at
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">30 June 2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Any structured transaction related
assets and liabilities, for which approval from a third party is
necessary</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">but will not be obtained prior to the
legal demerger, are not part of the transfers and demergers, but will be
separately transferred as soon as approvals have been obtained. The economic
ownership will however, to the greatest extent possible transfer to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> AMRO II N.V. pursuant to the legal
demerger.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #1b1c20; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ABN AMRO Bank N.V. and ABN AMRO II N.V.
reached agreements on the principles for the availability for ABN AMRO II N.V.
of the security rights connected with client relationships to be demerged to ABN
AMRO II N.V.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">19</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; COLOR: #006889; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">APPENDICES</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">I</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Opening balance sheet ABN AMRO II
N.V. at </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">9 April
2009</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">II&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Abbreviated Company financial statements
of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. for the years 2008, 2007 and 2006</font></font></div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>

                <td valign="bottom" width="89%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;
    </font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="89%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Shareholders&#8217;
      equity</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">45,000</font></td>

              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="89%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Total
      equity and liabilities</font></div>
                </td>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Management&#8217;s
report on the abbreviated financial statements</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The Managing Board
certifies that, to the best of their knowledge:</font></div>
        <div>
          <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
              <tr valign="top">
                <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                  <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">(i)&#160;&#160;</font></div>
                </td>
                <td>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">the
      abbreviated financial statements give a true and fair view, in all
      material respects, of the assets, liabilities, financial position and
      profit and loss of ABN AMRO Bank
N.V.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Amsterdam, 28 April
2009</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Gerrit
Zalm</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Chairman of the
Managing Board</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">David
Cole</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Chief Financial
Officer</font><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">3</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Basis
of presentation</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">On the basis of
article 403 of part 9 of the Netherlands Civil Code ABN AMRO Bank N.V. is not
required to publish financial statements. Only abbreviated financial statements
need to be drawn up and approved by the company directors. The shareholders of
ABN AMRO Bank N.V. have agreed to this in a declaration of consent, dated 28
April 2009 and filed with the Chamber of Commerce in Amsterdam. Furthermore a
statement of liability by the parent company (ABN AMRO Holding N.V.) is filed
with the Chamber of Commerce in Amsterdam. The assets and liabilities and the
income statement of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. are fully consolidated in the 2008
consolidated financial statements of ABN AMRO Holding N.V., which are included
in the 2008 Annual Report dated 24 March 2009.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The income
statement and balance sheet as presented on the next two pages are derived from
the presentation of the ABN AMRO Bank N.V. income statement and balance sheet on
page 212 to 214 of the ABN AMRO Holding N.V. 2008 Annual Report, dated 24 March
2009.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The difference of
EUR 9,681 million between Profit for the year in the ABN AMRO Bank N.V. Company
income statement for 2008 amounting to EUR (6,101) million and the Profit for
the year as per the ABN AMRO Holding N.V. Supplemental condensed consolidating
statement of income 2008 amounting to EUR 3,580 million mainly relates to the
gain on sale of Banco Real and other Santander acquired businesses which was
recognised in ABN AMRO Holding N.V. rather than in ABN AMRO Bank
N.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">An
unqualified auditor&#8217;s report was provided on the 2008 consolidated financial
statements of ABN AMRO Holding N.V. included in that Annual Report.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The consolidated financial statements of
ABN AMRO Holding N.V. for the year ended 31 December 2008 are prepared in
accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards (&#8216;IFRS&#8217;) as adopted
by the European Union (&#8216;EU&#8217;) and IFRS as issued by the International Accounting
Standards Board (&#8216;IASB&#8217;) and do not utilise the portfolio hedging carve out
permitted by the EU. Accordingly the accounting policies applied by the
Group&#160;&#160;&#160;fully comply with IFRS.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">In preparing the enclosed financial
information in respect of ABN AMRO Bank N.V., the same accounting principles and
methods of computation are applied as in the consolidated financial statements
at </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">31 December
2008</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and for the year then
ended of ABN AMRO Holding N.V. We refer to page 99 to 118 of the ABN AMRO
Holding N.V. 2008 Annual Report for the description of the accounting
policies</font>.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Certain amounts in the prior periods
have been reclassified to conform to the current presentation. This includes the
restatement for the classification of the Banco Real and other </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Santander</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> acquired businesses as discontinued
operations.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">4</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">

            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">6</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">

          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">To
the Shareholder, Supervisory Board and Managing Board of ABN AMRO Bank
N.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Auditor&#8217;s
report</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Introduction</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">We
have audited whether the accompanying abbreviated financial statements of ABN
AMRO Bank N.V., consisting of the balance sheet as at 31 December 2008 and
income statement for the year 2008 of ABN AMRO Bank N.V., Amsterdam, the
Netherlands as included in this document on pages 5 and 6 are consistent, in all
material respects, with the audited consolidated financial statements as
included in the Annual Report of ABN AMRO Holding N.V. dated 24 March 2009 from
which they have been derived.&#160;&#160;We expressed an unqualified opinion on
these financial statements. Management is responsible for the preparation of the
abbreviated financial statements in accordance with the accounting policies as
applied in the 2008 consolidated financial statements of ABN AMRO Holding N.V.
Our responsibility is to express an opinion on these abbreviated financial
statements.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Scope</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">We
conducted our audit in accordance with Dutch law. This law requires that we plan
and perform the audit to obtain reasonable assurance that the abbreviated
financial statements have been derived consistently from the consolidated
financial statements of ABN AMRO Holding N.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">We
believe that the audit evidence we have obtained is sufficient and appropriate
to provide a basis for our audit opinion.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Opinion</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">In
our opinion, these abbreviated financial statements have been derived
consistently, in all material respects, from the consolidated financial
statements of ABN AMRO Holding N.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Emphasis
of matter</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">For a better
understanding of the company&#8217;s financial position and results and the scope of
our audit, we emphasize that the abbreviated financial statements of ABN AMRO
Bank N.V. should be read in conjunction with the unabridged consolidated
financial statements of ABN AMRO Holding N.V., from which the abbreviated
financial statements of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. were derived and our unqualified
auditors&#8217; report thereon dated 24 March 2009. Our opinion is not qualified in
respect of this matter.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Deloitte
Accountants B.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Amsterdam, 28 April
2009</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Signed by J.C.G.M.
Bun&#233;</font><br>&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">7</font></div>

              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Appendix
II</font>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">Abbreviated Company financial statements
for the year 2007</font></font></div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 20pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">ABN
AMRO Bank N.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 20pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">Income
statement for the year 2007 and</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 20pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">Balance
sheet as at 31 December 2007</font></div>

          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif">2</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889">ABN</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #006889"> AMRO Bank N.V. pro forma demerger
financial information</font></font></div><br></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Basis
of presentation</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">According to
article 403 of part 9 of the Netherlands Civil Code ABN AMRO Bank N.V. is not
required to publish financial statements. Only a simplified set of financials
needs to be drawn up and approved by the directors. The shareholders of ABN AMRO
Bank N.V. have agreed to this in a declaration of consent. Furthermore a
statement of liability by the parent company (ABN AMRO Holding N.V.) is filed
with the Chamber of Commerce in Amsterdam. The assets and liabilities and the
income statement of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. are fully consolidated in the
consolidated financial statements of ABN AMRO Holding N.V.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The income statement and balance sheet
as presented on the next two pages are derived from the presentation of the ABN
AMRO Bank N.V. income statement and balance sheet on </font>page 218 to 220 of
ABN AMRO Holding N.V&#8217;s Annual Report 2007 dated 25 March 2008.</font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The consolidated financial statements of
ABN AMRO Holding N.V. for the year ended 31 December 2007 are prepared in
accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards (&#8216;IFRS&#8217;) as adopted
by the European Union (&#8216;EU&#8217;) and IFRS as issued by the International Accounting
Standards Board (&#8216;IASB&#8217;) and do not utilise the portfolio hedging carve out
permitted by the EU. Accordingly the accounting policies applied by the Group
fully comply with IFRS.</font></font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">In preparing this financial information,
the same accounting principles and methods of computation are applied as in the
consolidated financial statements at </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">31 December 2007</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and for the year then ended of ABN AMRO
Holding N.V. We refer to page 98 to 115 of ABN AMRO Holding N.V&#8217;s Annual Report
for the description of the accounting policies</font>. </font></div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
