              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">14</font></div>
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      De statuten van de Splitsende Vennootschap zullen ter gelegenheid van de
      splitsing worden gewijzigd overeenkomstig de concept statuten, welke aan
      dit voorstel zijn gehecht als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage
      4</font>.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The
      articles of association of the&#160;&#160;&#160;Demerging Company will be
      amended at the occasion of this demerger in accordance with the draft
      articles of association attached to this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule
      4</font>.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Overgang deel van het vermogen van de Splitsende
    Vennootschap.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Transfer of part of the assets and liabilities of the Demerging
      Company.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Slechts
      een deel van het vermogen van de Splitsende Vennootschap zal onder
      algemene titel overgaan op de Verkrijgende Vennootschap.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">A
      part of the assets and liabilities of the Demerging Company only shall be
      transferred under universal title of succession (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">onder algemene titel</font>)
      to the Acquiring Company.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Beschrijving
      van de vermogensbestanddelen die overgaan op de Verkrijgende Vennootschap
      en van de vermogensbestanddelen die door de Splitsende Vennootschap worden
      behouden.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Detailed description of assets and liabilities to be transferred to the
      Acquiring Company and of those remaining with the Demerging
      Company.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;De
      Verkrijgende Vennootschap zal de in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage 5</font>
      omschreven ver-mogensbestanddelen van de Splitsende Vennootschap
      verkrijgen. De beschrijving van deze vermogensbestanddelen is gewaardeerd
      op de toestand per 30 juni 2009. Deze beschrijving voldoet aan de
      vereisten van artikel 2:94b juncto artikel 2:334bb, van het Burgerlijk
      Wetboek.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The Acquiring Company shall acquire the ownership of those assets and
      liabilities of the Demerging Company that have been specified in the
      document attached to this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule 5</font>. The
      description of these assets and liabilities is valued at the situation as
      per 30 June 2009 This description meets the requirements of Section 2:94b
      in conjunction with Section 2:334bb of the Dutch Civil
    Code.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;De
      volgende waarderingsmethoden zijn gebruikt om de waarde van de
      vermogensbestanddelen die zullen worden verkregen door de Verkrijgende
      Vennootschap vast te stellen:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font>Boekwaarde (zoals toegepast in de
      jaarrekening van ABN AMRO Holding N.V. over 2008).</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The following valuation methods were used to determine the value of the
      assets and liabilities to be acquired by the Acquiring
      Company:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Book
      value (as applied in the annual accounts of ABN AMRO Holding N.V. over
      2008).</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>

          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      De accountantsverklaring met betrekking tot de vermogensbestand-delen die
      zullen worden verkregen door de Verkrijgende Vennootschap&#160;&#160;als
      bedoeld in artikel 2:94b juncto artikel 2:334bb van het Burgerlijk Wetboek
      is aangehecht aan het splitsingsvoorstel als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage&#160;6</font>.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The auditor&#8217;s statement with respect to the assets and liabilities to be
      acquired by the Acquiring Company as referred to in Section 2:94b in
      conjunction with Section 2:334bb of the Dutch Civil Code has been attached
      to this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;6.</font></font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Uitsluitend die vermogens-bestanddelen van de Splitsende Vennootschap
      waarvan in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage&#160;5</font>
      is beschreven dat deze ter gelegenheid van de splitsing zullen worden
      afgesplitst, zullen worden verkregen door de Verkrijgende Vennootschap. De
      overige vermogensbestanddelen van de Splitsende Vennootschap zullen worden
      behouden door de Splitsende Vennootschap terzake deze
      splitsing.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Only those assets and liabilities of the Demerging Company that are
      specified in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;5</font>
      as being demerged on occasion of the Demerger will be acquired by the
      Acquiring Company. The remaining assets and liabilities of the Demerging
      Company shall be retained by the Demerging Company as part of this
      demerger.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      De accountantsverklaring met betrekking tot de vermogensbestand-delen die
      zullen worden behouden door de Splitsende Vennootschap als bedoeld in
      artikel 2:334aa lid 2 van het Burgerlijk Wetboek is aangehecht aan het
      splitsingsvoorstel als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage&#160;7</font>.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The auditor&#8217;s statement with respect to the assets and liabilities that
      shall be retained by the Demerging Company as referred to in Section
      2:334aa paragraph 2 of the Dutch Civil Code has been attached to this
      proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;7.</font></font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      De pro forma winst- en verliesrekeningen van zowel de Splitsende
      Vennootschap als de Verkrijgende Vennootschap zijn aangehecht aan het
      splitsingsvoorstel als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage&#160;8</font>.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The pro forma profit and loss accounts of the Demerging Company and the
      Acquiring Company have been attached to this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;8</font>.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>

            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">

          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Waarde
      van het vermogen dat de Verkrijgende Vennoot-schap zal verkrijgen en van
      het deel dat de Splitsende Vennootschap zal behouden.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Value of the assets and liabilities to be acquired by the Acquiring
      Company and of those retained by the Demerging Company.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      De waarde van het vermogen dat de Verkrijgende Vennootschap bij de
      splitsing zal verkrijgen is (afgerond) &#233;&#233;n miljard negenhonderd twintig
      miljoen euro (&#8364;&#160;1.920.000.000)</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The value attached to the assets and liabilities to be acquired by the
      Acquiring Company amounts to (approximately) one billion nine hundred
      twenty million euro (&#8364;&#160;1,920,000,000).</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      De waarde van het deel van het vermogen dat de Splitsende Vennootschap zal
      behouden is (afgerond) twee miljard vijfhonderd twee miljoen&#160;euro
      (&#8364;&#160;2.502.000.000).</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The value attached to the assets and liabilities that shall be retained by
      the Demerging Company amounts to (approximately) two billion five hundred
      two million euro (&#8364;&#160;2,502,000,000).</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      De hierboven genoemde waardes zijn bepaald per de datum van de
      tussentijdse vermogensopstelling, 30 juni 2009.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The values mentioned above have been determined as per the date of the
      interim balance sheet, 30 June 2009.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Bijzondere rechten of voordelen ten laste van de Splitsende Vennootschap
      overeenkomstig artikel 2:334p van het Burgerlijk Wetboek.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Allocation
      of rights due or compensation chargeable to the Demerging Company pursuant
      to Section 2:334p of the Dutch Civil Code.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">De
      aan de Staat der Nederlanden door de Splitsende Vennootschap
      uitgegeven&#160;&#160;schuldinstrumenten (als bedoeld onder <a href="#_ref238379285">(M)</a> hierboven) zullen volledig worden
      afgesplitst naar de Verkrijgende Vennootschap, hetgeen expliciet is
      voorzien in deze instrumenten. Als gevolg daarvan zal de Staat der
      Nederlanden gelijkwaardige rechten als bedoeld in artikel 2:334p van het
      Burgerlijk Wetboek verkrijgen.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Overigens,
      zijn er geen (rechts)personen die anders dan als aandeelhouder bijzondere
      rechten jegens de Splitsende Vennootschap hebben, zodat geen rechten of
      vergoedingen worden toegekend.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      debt instruments which have been issued to the State of the Netherlands
      (as referred to under <a href="#_ref238379350">(M)</a> above) shall be
      entirely split off to the Acquiring Company as being explicitly provided
      in these debt instruments. Consequently, the State of the Netherlands
      shall acquire equivalent rights as meant in Section 2:334p of the Dutch
      Civil Code.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Otherwise,
      there are no persons who, in any other capacity than as shareholder, have
      special rights against the Demerging Company. Therefore no special rights
      are due and no compensation shall be paid to anyone on account of the
      Demerging Company.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

      Toekenning van Voordelen</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>

                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Benefits granted</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ter
      gelegenheid van de splitsing zullen er geen voordelen aan bestuurders of
      commissarissen van de Vennootschappen of aan anderen betrokken bij de
      splitsing worden toegekend.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">No
      benefits shall be granted to managing directors or members of the
      supervisory board of the Companies or to others on occasion of the
      demerger.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>

                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Samenstelling van de Raad van Bestuur van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap
      </font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Management board of the Acquiring Company</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Thans bestaat de raad van bestuur van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap
      uit:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Gerrit Zalm, geboren te Enkhuizen op 6 mei 1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Johan van Hall, geboren te Baarn op 24 februari 1960; en</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font>Christiaan Franciscus Henricus Herman Vogelzang, geboren te Haarlem
      op 28 november 1962.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      At present the management board of the Acquiring Company is constituted as
      follows:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Gerrit
      Zalm, born in Enkhuizen, the Netherlands on 6 May 1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;
      &#160;(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Johan van Hall, born in Baarn, the Netherlands on 24 February 1960;
      and</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Christiaan Franciscus Henricus Herman Vogelzang, born in Haarlem, the
      Netherlands on 28 November 1962.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Er
      bestaat een voornemen na de splitsing wijziging te brengen in de
      samenstelling van het bestuur van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap. De
      samenstelling van de raad van bestuur zal dan worden:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Javier
      Maldonado Trinchant, geboren te Madrid, Spanje, op 11 juli
      1962;</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The composition of the management board of the Acquiring Company shall be
      amended on occasion of the demerger. The composition of the management
      board shall then be as follows:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Javier Maldonado Trinchant, born in Madrid, Spain, on 11 July 1962;
      </font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>

                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Jeroen Joseph Marie Kremers, geboren te Doornspijk, op 8 november
      1958;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Brian David Stevenson, geboren te Lewes, Sussex,
      Verenigd&#160;&#160;Koninkrijk, op 11 november 1953;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; John
      Donald Black Workman, geboren te Glasgow, Verenigd Koninkrijk, op 31 juli
      1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Gerrit
      Zalm, geboren te Enkhuizen op 6 mei 1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Johan van Hall, geboren te Baarn op 24 februari 1960;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Christiaan
      Franciscus Henricus Herman Vogelzang, geboren te Haarlem op 28 november
      1962;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Ronald
      Teerlink, geboren te Loosdrecht op 28 januari 1961; en</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      David Alan Cole, geboren in Atlanta, Verenigde Staten van Amerika, op 2
      oktober 1961.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Jeroen Joseph Marie Kremers, born in Doornspijk, the Netherlands, on 8
      November 1958;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Brian
      David Stevenson, born in Lewes, Sussex, United Kingdom, on 11 November
      1953;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; John
      Donald Black Workman, born in Glasgow, United Kingdom, on 31 July 1952;
      </font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Gerrit
      Zalm, born in Enkhuizen, the Netherlands on 6 May 1952; </font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Johan van Hall, born in Baarn, the Netherlands, on 24 February 1960;
      </font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Christiaan
      Franciscus Henricus Herman Vogelzang, born in Haarlem, the Netherlands, on
      28 November 1962;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Ronald
      Teerlink, born in Loosdrecht, the Netherlands, on 28 January 1961; and
      </font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;
      (i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      David Alan Cole, born in Atlanta, United States of America, on 2 October
      1961. </font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>

            <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">19</font></div>
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">

          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Samenstelling
      van de Raad&#160;&#160;van Commissarissen van de verkrijgende
      Vennootschap</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Composition of the&#160;&#160;Supervisory Board of the Acquiring
      Company</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">9.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Thans heeft de Verkrijgende Vennootschap geen raad van commissarissen. Ter
      gelegenheid van de splitsing zal echter een raad van commissarissen worden
      ingesteld die dan zal bestaan uit de volgende personen:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Trude Albertine Maas-de Brouwer, geboren te Amsterdam op 28 november
      1946;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Arthur Caulfield Martinez, geboren te New York, Verenigde Staten van
      Amerika, op 25 september 1939;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Andries Arij Olijslager, geboren te Terneuzen, op 1 januari
      1944;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Gert Jan Kramer, geboren te Heemstede, op 20 juni 1942;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Ana Maria Llopis Rivas, geboren te Cumana-Sucre, Venezuela op 5 mei
      1950;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Juan Rodriquez Inciarte, geboren te Oviedo, Spanje, op 27 juni
      1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Michael Enthoven, geboren te Haarlem op 7 mei 1951; en</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Miller Roy McLean, geboren te Dumbarton, Verenigd Koninkrijk, op 4
      december 1949.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">9.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      At present the Acquiring Company does not have a supervisory board.
      However at the occasion of the demerger a supervisory board shall be
      established which shall then be constituted as follows:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Trude Albertine Maas-de Brouwer, born in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, on 28
      November 1946</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Arthur Caulfield Martinez, born in New York, United States of America, on
      25 September 1939;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 90pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Andries Arij Olijslager, born in Terneuzen, the Netherlands, on 1 January
      1944;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Gert Jan Kramer, born in Heemstede, the Netherlands, on 20 June
      1942;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Ana
      Maria Llopis Rivas, born in Cumana-Sucre, Venezuela on 5 May
      1950;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Juan
      Rodriquez Inciarte, born in Oviedo, Spain, on 27 June 1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Michael
      Enthoven, born in Haarlem, the Netherlands, on 7 May 1951;
and</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Miller
      Roy McLean, born in Dumbarton, United Kingdom, on 4 December
      1949.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
