                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Samenstelling van de Raad&#160;van Bestuur van de Splitsende
      Vennootschap</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Management
      board of the&#160;&#160;&#160;Demerging Company</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">10.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Thans bestaat de Raad van Bestuur van de Splitsende Vennootschap
      uit:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Javier Maldonado Trinchant, geboren te Madrid, Spanje, op 11 juli
      1962;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Jeroen Joseph Marie Kremers, geboren te Doornspijk, op 8 november
      1958;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Brian David Stevenson, geboren te Lewes, Sussex,
      Verenigd&#160;&#160;Koninkrijk, op 11 november 1953;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      John Donald Black Workman, geboren te Glasgow, Verenigd Koninkrijk, op 31
      juli 1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Gerrit Zalm, geboren te Enkhuizen op 6 mei 1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Johan van Hall, geboren te Baarn op 24 februari 1960;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Christiaan Franciscus Henricus Herman Vogelzang, geboren te Haarlem op 28
      november 1962;</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">10.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      At present the management board of the Demerging Company is constituted as
      follows:</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Javier Maldonado Trinchant, born in Madrid, Spain, on 11 July
      1962;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Jeroen
      Jospeh Marie Kremers, born in Doornspijk, the Netherlands, on 8 November
      1958;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Brian David Stevenson, born in Lewes, Sussex, United Kingdom, on 11
      November 1953;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      John Donald Black Workman, born in Glasgow, United Kingdom, on 31 July
      1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 117pt; TEXT-INDENT: -72pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Gerrit Zalm, born in Enkhuizen, the Netherlands on 6 May
1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Johan van Hall, born in Baarn, the Netherlands, on 24 February
      1960;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Christiaan
      Franciscus Henricus Herman Vogelzang, born in Haarlem, the Netherlands, on
      28 November 1962;</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>

      Caulfield Martinez, geboren te New York, Verenigde Staten van Amerika, op

      Jan Kramer, geboren te Heemstede, op 20 juni 1942;</font></div>

      present the supervisory board of the Demerging Company is constituted as

                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

      Arthur Caulfield Martinez, born in New York, United States of America, on
      25 September 1939;</font></div>

                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

      1950;</font></div>

                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Juan
      Rodriquez Inciarte, geboren te Oviedo, Spanje, op 27 juni
      1952;</font></div>

                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Michael Enthoven, geboren te Haarlem op 7 mei 1951; en</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Miller Roy McLean, geboren te Dumbarton, Verenigd Koninkrijk, op 4
      december 1949.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div>&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Ana Maria Llopis Rivas, born in Cumana-Sucre, Venezuela on 5 May
      1950;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Juan Rodriquez Inciarte, born in Oviedo, Spain, on 27 June
      1952;</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Michael Enthoven, born in Haarlem, the Netherlands, on 7 May 1951;
      and</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Miller Roy McLean, born in Dumbarton, United Kingdom, on 4 December
      1949.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">11.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Er
      bestaat geen voornemen na de splitsing wijziging te brengen in de
      samenstelling van de raad van commissarissen van de Splitsende
      Vennootschap.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">11.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The composition of the supervisory board of the Demerging Company shall
      not be amended on occasion of the demerger.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">12.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Tijdstip
      verantwoording financi&#235;le gegevens</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">12.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Effective
      financial date</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">De
      financi&#235;le gegevens van de af te splitsen activa en passiva van de
      Splitsende Vennootschap zullen met ingang van de eerste dag van de maand
      waarin de splitsing wordt ge&#235;ffectueerd worden verantwoord in de
      jaarstukken of andere financi&#235;le verantwoording van de Verkrijgende
      Vennootschap.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      financial particulars of the assets and liabilities of the Demerging
      Company that will be split off shall be reflected in the annual accounts
      or other financial reports of the Acquiring Company as per the first day
      of the month in which the demerger is
  effectuated.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

                <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
              </div>

          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">13.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Maatregelen
      in verband met het verkrijgen van het aandeelhouderschap in de
      Verkrijgende Vennootschap</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">13.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Measures in connection with shareholding in Demerging
    Company</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ter
      gelegenheid van de splitsing zullen aan de Aandeelhouder 499.954.999
      aandelen in het kapitaal van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap worden
      toegekend.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">On
      occasion of the demerger, the Acquiring Company shall allot 499,954,999
      shares in its share capital to the Shareholder.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">14.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Activiteiten van de Splitsende Vennootschap</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">14.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Activities of the Demerging Company</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">De
      activiteiten van de Splitsende Vennootschap worden voortgezet door de
      Verkrijgende Vennootschap, voor zover het betreft die ten aanzien van de
      af te splitsen vermogensbestanddelen.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      activities of the Demerging Company shall be continued by the Acquiring
      Company, to the extent those activities relate to the assets and
      liabilities to be transferred to the Acquiring Company.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">15.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Goedkeuring van het besluit tot splitsing</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">15.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Approval of resolution to enter into demerger</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Overeenkomstig hetgeen is bepaald in Artikel 19 van de statuten van de
      Splitsende Vennootschap is het bestuursbesluit betreffende het voorstel de
      splitsing aan te gaan onderworpen aan de voorafgaande goedkeuring van de
      algemene vergadering van aandeelhouders van de Splitsende
      Vennootschap.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      In accordance with article 19 of the articles of association of the
      Demerging Company the board resolution to propose to enter into the
      demerger requires the prior approval of the general meeting of
      shareholders of the Demerging Company.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Het voorstel tot splitsing is goedgekeurd door de raad van commissarissen
      van de Splitsende Vennootschap op 29 september 2009.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The demerger proposal was approved by the supervisory board of the
      Demerging Company on 29 September 2009.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Het besluit tot splitsing is onderworpen aan goedkeuring van De
      Nederlandsche Bank.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The resolution to enter into the demerger requires approval of the Dutch
      Central Bank.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
            <div id="FTR">
              <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">24</font></div>
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">

      Goodwill en uitkeerbare reserves van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap
      </font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>

      Goodwill and distributable reserves of the Acquiring
    Company</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                  <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">16.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;De
      uitkeerbare reserves van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap nemen als gevolg van
      de splitsing toe met </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#233;&#233;n
      miljard &#233;&#233;nhonderd vijfenzestig miljoen euro (&#8364;1.165.000.000). De
      uitkeerbare reserves van de Splitsende Vennootschap nemen af met &#233;&#233;n
      miljard zeshonderd vijfenzestig miljoen euro
(&#8364;1.665.000.000).</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Er
      zijn geen gevolgen ten aanzien van de goodwill.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">16.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The
      distributable reserves of the Acquiring Company will as a result of the
      demerger increase by an amount of one billion one hundred sixty-five
      million euro (&#8364;1,165,000,000). The distributable reserves of the Demerging
      Company will decrease by an amount of one billion six hundred and
      sixty-five million euro (&#8364;1,665,000,000).</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 90pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">There
      are no consequences with respect to the goodwill.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>

                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">De
      ingevolge artikel 2:334y van het Burgerlijk Wetboek aanvullend te
      vermelden gegevens zijn de volgende:</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      information which has to be made additionally available pursuant to
      Section&#160;2:334y of the Dutch Civil Code is the
    following:</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">17.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      De ruilverhouding van de aandelen en de omvang van de betalingen
      </font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">17.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The share exchange ratio and the amount of payments </font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Ter
      gelegenheid van de splitsing zullen 499.954.999 aandelen in het kapitaal
      van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap met een nominale waarde van &#8364;&#160;1,--
      elk, genummerd 45.001 tot en met 499.999.999, aan de Aandeelhouder worden
      toegekend. De ruilverhouding bedraagt derhalve een toekenning van
      499.954.999 aandelen in het kapitaal van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap
      tegen verkrijging door de Verkrijgende Vennootschap van de
      vermogensbestanddelen zoals opgenomen in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage
      5</font>.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      On the occasion of the demerger 499,954,999 shares in the share capital of
      the Acquiring Company, having a nominal value of &#8364; 1 each, numbered 45,001
      through 499,999,999 shall be allotted to the Shareholder. The exchange
      ratio therefore is an allotment of 499,954,999 shares in the share capital
      of the Acquiring Company in exchange for the acquisition by the Acquiring
      Company of the assets and liabilities as referred to in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;5</font>.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  </td>
                </tr>

            <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">25</font></div>
              <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
                <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div id="HDR">
              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font>

                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      De Aandeelhouder heeft ingestemd met het buiten toepassing laten van
      artikel 2:334aa leden 1 en 3 van het Burgerlijk Wetboek, zulks
      overeenkomstig artikel 2:334aa lid 7 van het Burgerlijk
      Wetboek.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Het verschil tussen de waarde van het gedeelte van het vermogen van de
      Splitsende Vennootschap dat de Verkrijgende Vennootschap bij de splitsing
      zal verkrijgen en de totale nominale waarde van de toe te kennen aandelen,
      zal als agio worden geboekt.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Ter
      gelegenheid van de splitsing zullen krachtens de ruilverhouding geen
      betalingen plaatsvinden.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font>

                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The Shareholders has agreed to not apply Section 2:334aa paragraphs 1 and
      3 of the Dutch Civil Code, such in accordance with Section 2:334aa
      paragraph 7 of the Dutch Civil Code.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      The difference between the value of that part of the assets and
      liabilities of the Demerging Company which will be acquired by the
      Acquiring Company as a result of the demerger and the total nominal value
      of the shares to be allocated will be booked as share
premium.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      No payments shall be made pursuant to the exchange ratio at the occasion
      of the demerger.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">18.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Tijdstip met ingang waarvan en welke mate waarin de Aandeelhouder zal gaan
      delen in de winst van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">18.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      the date as of which and extent to which the Shareholder will participate
      in the profits of the Acquiring company</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">De
      Aandeelhouder zal vanaf de eerste dag van de maand waarin de splitsing
      wordt ge&#235;ffectueerd, gelijkelijk met de thans reeds in het kapitaal van de
      Verkrijgende Vennootschap gehouden aandelen, volledig delen in dat deel
      van de winst van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap dat verband houdt met de af
      te splitsen vermogensbestanddelen.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Shareholder will, equally with the shares it already holds in the share
      capital of the Acquiring Company, fully participate in the that part of
      the profits of the Acquiring Company which relates to the assets and
      liabilities to be demerged as from the first day of the month in which the
      demerger is effectuated.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
          </div>

              </div>

              <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">

          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">&#160;</div>
          <div align="left">
            <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">19.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Het aantal aandelen dat zal worden ingetrokken </font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 45pt; TEXT-INDENT: -45pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">19.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      the number of shares to be cancelled</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Geen.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">None.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Dit
      voorstel tot splitsing komt tot stand zodra het rechtsgeldig is
      ondertekend door alle bestuurders en commissarissen. Het is niet vereist
      dat alle ondertekenaars hetzelfde exemplaar van dit voorstel tot splitsing
      tekenen. Indien ondertekening op verschillende exemplaren van dit voorstel
      tot splitsing geschiedt, vormen de desbetreffende exemplaren tezamen &#233;&#233;n
      voorstel tot splitsing.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">This
      demerger proposal will come into effect, when legally signed by all
      members of the management board and the supervisory board. It is not
      required that all signatories sign the same copy of this demerger
      proposal. In case the signing will take place on multiple copies of this
      demerger proposal, these multiple copies together will constitute one
      demerger proposal.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Te
      ondertekenen door alle leden van de raden van bestuur van de
      Vennootschappen en de raad van commissarissen van de Splitsende
      Vennootschap.</font></div>
                  </td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                  <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">To
      be signed by all managing directors of the Companies and the members of
      the supervisory board of the Demerging Company.</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td colspan="4" valign="top" width="100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td colspan="4" valign="top" width="100%">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Amsterdam,
      30 September 2009</font></div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
            </table>

                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Plaats/Place:
      Amsterdam</font></div>
                  </td>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">
        <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right" align="left"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: black; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Item
4</font></div>
        <div align="left">&#160;</div>
        <div align="left">
          <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">This
      right column contains the unofficial translation of the demerger proposal
      relating to the legal demerger described below. Dutch statutory law
      stipulates that this document must be filed in Dutch. Therefore, this
      translation is for information purposes only. All schedules referenced
      herein are available <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">from the ABN AMRO press room
      at</font></font></font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #0000ff; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">http://www.abnamro.com/pressroom/releasedetail.cfm?releaseid=412432</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">.</font></font></font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Voorstel
      tot Splitsing</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Demerger
      proposal</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Opgesteld
      door de raden van bestuur van:</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Drawn
      up by the management boards of:</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ABN AMRO Bank N.V.</font>,<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>een naamloze
      vennootschap, statutair gevestigd te Amsterdam en kantoorhoudende te
      Gustav Mahlerlaan 10, 1082 PP Amsterdam, ingeschreven in het
      Handelsregister van de Kamer van Koophandel en Fabrieken voor Amsterdam,
      onder nummer: 33002587 (de <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Splitsende
      Vennootschap</font>); en</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ABN AMRO Bank N.V.</font>,<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font>a
      company with limited liability (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">naamloze vennootschap</font>)
      incorporated under the laws of the Netherlands, having its official seat
      in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, and its office address at Gustav Mahlerlaan
      10, 1082 PP Amsterdam, the Netherlands, registered with the trade register
      of the Chamber of Commerce and Industries for Amsterdam under number:
      33002587 (the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Demerging
      Company</font>); and</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ABN AMRO II N.V.</font>, een
      naamloze vennootschap, statutair gevestigd te Amsterdam en kantoorhoudende
      te Gustav Mahlerlaan 10, 1082 PP Amsterdam, ingeschreven in het
      Handelsregister van de Kamer van Koophandel en Fabrieken voor Amsterdam,
      onder nummer: 34334259 (de <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Verkrijgende
      Vennootschap</font>),</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ABN AMRO II N.V.</font>, a
      company with limited liability (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">naamloze vennootschap</font>)
      incorporated under the laws of the Netherlands, having its official seat
      in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, and its office address at Gustav Mahlerlaan
      10, 1082 PP Amsterdam, the Netherlands, registered with the trade register
      of the Chamber of Commerce and Industries for Amsterdam under number:
      34334259 (the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Acquiring
      Company</font>),</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>

                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">de
      Splitsende Vennootschap en de Verkrijgende Vennootschap hierna ook tezamen
      aangeduid als: de <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Vennootschappen</font>.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">the
      Demerging Company and the Acquiring Company are hereinafter jointly also
      referred to as: the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Companies</font>.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
