              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160; </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Rechtsvorm,
      naam en zetel</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font></font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Legal
      form, name and seat</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.1
      &#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ABN AMRO Bank
      N.V.</font>, een naamloze vennootschap, statutair gevestigd te Amsterdam
      en kantoorhoudende te Gustav Mahlerlaan 10, 1082 PP
    Amsterdam.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

      <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ABN AMRO Bank
      N.V.</font>, a company with limited liability (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">naamloze vennootschap</font>)
      incorporated under the laws of the Netherlands, having its official seat
      in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, and its office address at Gustav Mahlerlaan
      10, 1082 PP Amsterdam, the Netherlands.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>

              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.2

      <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ABN AMRO II N.V</font>.,

                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Statuten
      van de Verkrijgende en Splitsende&#160;&#160;Vennootschap</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">2.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Articles
      of Association of the Acquiring and Demerging Company</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.1&#160;&#160;&#160;De
      statuten van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap zijn vastgesteld bij akte van
      oprichting verleden voor mr. Dirk-Jan Jeroen Smit, notaris te Amsterdam,
      op 9 april tweeduizend negen. De statuten zijn nadien niet meer gewijzigd.
      Een kopie van de statuten van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap zoals deze
      thans luiden is aan dit voorstel gehecht als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage
      1</font>.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.1&#160;
      The articles of association of the Acquiring Company have been established
      by deed of incorporation, executed before Dirk-Jan Jeroen Smit, civil law
      notary, officiating in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, on 9 April 2009. These
      articles of association have not been amended ever since. A copy of the
      current articles of association of the Acquiring Company is attached to
      this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;1</font>.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>

        </div>

        <div>&#160;</div>
        <div align="left">
          <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.2&#160;&#160;
      De statuten van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap zullen ter gelegenheid van de
      Nederlandse Splitsing worden gewijzigd, overeenkomstig de conceptstatuten,
      welke aan dit voorstel zijn gehecht als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage
      2</font>.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.2.
      The articles of association of the&#160;&#160;&#160;Acquiring Company will
      be amended at the occasion of the Dutch Demerger in accordance with the
      draft articles of association attached to this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule
      2</font>.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.3&#160;&#160;
      De statuten van de Splitsende Vennootschap zijn laatstelijk gewijzigd bij
      akte van parti&#235;le wijziging van de statuten verleden voor mr. B.J. Kuck,
      notaris te Amsterdam, op 26 juni 2009. Een kopie van de statuten van de
      Splitsende Vennootschap zoals deze thans luiden is aan dit voorstel
      gehecht als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage
      3</font>.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.3&#160;&#160;
      The articles of association of the Demerging Company have lastly been
      amended by deed of partial amendment of the articles of association,
      executed before B.J. Kuck, civil law notary, officiating in Amsterdam, the
      Netherlands, on 26 June 2009. A copy of the current articles of
      association of the Demerging Company is attached to this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;3</font>.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.4&#160;&#160;
      De statuten van de Splitsende Vennootschap zullen ter gelegenheid van de
      Nederlandse Splitsing worden gewijzigd overeenkomstig de concept statuten,
      welke aan dit voorstel zijn gehecht als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage
      4</font>.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.4&#160;
      The articles of association of the&#160;&#160;&#160;Demerging Company will
      be amended at the occasion of the Dutch Demerger in accordance with the
      draft articles of association attached to this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule
      4</font>.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Overgang deel van het vermogen van de Splitsende
    Vennootschap.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Transfer of part of the assets and liabilities of the Demerging
      Company.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Slechts
      een deel van het vermogen van de Splitsende Vennootschap zal onder
      algemene titel overgaan op de Verkrijgende Vennootschap.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">A
      part of the assets and liabilities of the Demerging Company only shall be
      transferred under universal title of succession (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">onder algemene titel</font>)
      to the Acquiring Company.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Beschrijving van de vermogensbestanddelen die overgaan op de Verkrijgende
      Vennootschap en van de vermogensbestanddelen die door de Splitsende
      Vennootschap worden behouden.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Detailed description of assets and liabilities to be transferred to the
      Acquiring Company and of those remaining with the Demerging
      Company.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">

        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>
        <div align="left">
          <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.1&#160;&#160;
      De Verkrijgende Vennootschap zal de in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage 5</font>
      omschreven ver-mogensbestanddelen van de Splitsende Vennootschap
      verkrijgen. De beschrijving van deze vermogensbestanddelen is gewaardeerd
      op de toestand per 30 juni 2009. Deze beschrijving voldoet aan de
      vereisten van artikel 2:94b juncto artikel 2:334bb, van het Burgerlijk
      Wetboek.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.1&#160;&#160;
      The Acquiring Company shall acquire the ownership of those assets and
      liabilities of the Demerging Company that have been specified in the
      document attached to this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule 5</font>. The
      description of these assets and liabilities is valued at the situation as
      per 30 June 2009 This description meets the requirements of Section 2:94b
      in conjunction with Section 2:334bb of the Dutch Civil
    Code.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.2&#160;&#160;
      De volgende waarderingsmethoden zijn gebruikt om de waarde van de
      vermogensbestanddelen die zullen worden verkregen door de Verkrijgende
      Vennootschap vast te stellen:</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Boekwaarde
      (zoals toegepast in de jaarrekening van ABN AMRO Holding N.V. over
      2008).</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.2&#160;&#160;
      The following valuation methods were used to determine the value of the
      assets and liabilities to be acquired by the Acquiring
      Company:</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Book
      value (as applied in the annual accounts of ABN AMRO Holding N.V. over
      2008).</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.3&#160;
      De accountantsverklaring met betrekking tot de vermogensbestand-delen die
      zullen worden verkregen door de Verkrijgende Vennootschap&#160;&#160;als
      bedoeld in artikel 2:94b juncto artikel 2:334bb van het Burgerlijk Wetboek
      is aangehecht aan het splitsingsvoorstel als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage&#160;6</font>.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.3&#160;&#160;
      The auditor&#8217;s statement with respect to the assets and liabilities to be
      acquired by the Acquiring Company as referred to in Section 2:94b in
      conjunction with Section 2:334bb of the Dutch Civil Code has been attached
      to this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline"><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;6</font>.</font></font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.4&#160;&#160;
      Uitsluitend die vermogens-bestanddelen van de Splitsende Vennootschap
      waarvan in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage&#160;5</font>
      is beschreven dat deze ter gelegenheid van de splitsing zullen worden
      afgesplitst, zullen worden verkregen door de Verkrijgende Vennootschap. De
      overige vermogensbestanddelen van de Splitsende Vennootschap zullen worden
      behouden door de Splitsende Vennootschap terzake deze
      splitsing.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.4&#160;&#160;
      Only those assets and liabilities of the Demerging Company that are
      specified in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;5</font>
      as being demerged on occasion of the Demerger will be acquired by the
      Acquiring Company. The remaining assets and liabilities of the Demerging
      Company shall be retained by the Demerging Company as part of this
      demerger.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>

        <div>&#160;</div>
        <div align="left">
          <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.5&#160;
      De accountantsverklaring met betrekking tot de vermogensbestand-delen die
      zullen worden behouden door de Splitsende Vennootschap als bedoeld in
      artikel 2:334aa lid 2 van het Burgerlijk Wetboek is aangehecht aan het
      splitsingsvoorstel als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage&#160;7</font>.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.5
      The auditor&#8217;s statement with respect to the assets and liabilities that
      shall be retained by the Demerging Company as referred to in Section
      2:334aa paragraph 2 of the Dutch Civil Code has been attached to this
      proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline"><font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;7</font>.</font></font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.6&#160;
      De pro forma winst- en verliesrekeningen van zowel de Splitsende
      Vennootschap als de Verkrijgende Vennootschap zijn aangehecht aan het
      splitsingsvoorstel als <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage&#160;8</font>.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">4.6&#160;&#160;
      The pro forma profit and loss accounts of the Demerging Company and the
      Acquiring Company have been attached to this proposal as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;8</font>.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Waarde
      van het vermogen dat de Verkrijgende Vennoot-schap zal verkrijgen en van
      het deel dat de Splitsende Vennootschap zal behouden.</font></font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Value
      of the assets and liabilities to be acquired by the Acquiring Company and
      of those retained by the Demerging Company.</font></font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.1&#160;&#160;&#160;
      De waarde van het vermogen dat de Verkrijgende Vennootschap bij de
      splitsing zal verkrijgen is (afgerond)&#160;&#160;vijftien miljoen euro
      (&#8364;&#160;15.000.000)</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.1&#160;&#160;
      The value attached to the assets and liabilities to be acquired by the
      Acquiring Company amounts to (approximately) fifteen million euro (&#8364;
      15,000,000).</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.2&#160;&#160;
      De waarde van het deel van het vermogen dat de Splitsende Vennootschap zal
      behouden is (afgerond) twee miljard vierhonderd zevenentachtig
      miljoen&#160;euro (&#8364;&#160;2.487.000.000).</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.2&#160;&#160;
      The value attached to the assets and liabilities that shall be retained by
      the Demerging Company amounts to (approximately) two billion four hundred
      and eighty-seven million euro (&#8364;&#160;2,487,000,000).</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.3
      De hierboven genoemde waardes zijn bepaald per de datum van de
      tussentijdse vermogensopstelling, 30 juni 2009.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5.3&#160;&#160;
      The values mentioned above have been determined as per the date of the
      interim balance sheet, 30 June
2009.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">

            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17</font></div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>
        <div align="left">
          <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">6.&#160;&#160;
      Bijzondere rechten of voordelen ten laste van de Splitsende Vennootschap
      overeenkomstig artikel 2:334p van het Burgerlijk Wetboek.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Allocation
      of rights due or compensation chargeable to the Demerging Company pursuant
      to Section 2:334p of the Dutch Civil Code.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">De
      aan de Staat der Nederlanden door de Splitsende Vennootschap
      uitgegeven&#160;&#160;schuldinstrumenten (als bedoeld onder <a href="#_ref238380796">(N)</a> hierboven) zullen volledig worden
      afgesplitst naar de Verkrijgende Vennootschap, hetgeen expliciet is
      voorzien in deze instrumenten. Als gevolg daarvan zal de Staat der
      Nederlanden gelijkwaardige rechten als bedoeld in artikel 2:334p van het
      Burgerlijk Wetboek verkrijgen.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Overigens,
      zijn er geen (rechts)personen die anders dan als aandeelhouder bijzondere
      rechten jegens de Splitsende Vennootschap hebben, zodat geen rechten of
      vergoedingen worden toegekend.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      debt instruments which have been issued to the State of the Netherlands
      (as referred to under <a href="#_ref238380808">(N)</a> above) shall be
      entirely split off to the Acquiring Company as being explicitly provided
      in these debt instruments. Consequently, the State of the Netherlands
      shall acquire equivalent rights as meant in Section 2:334p of the Dutch
      Civil Code.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Otherwise,
      there are no persons who, in any other capacity than as shareholder, have
      special rights against the Demerging Company. Therefore no special rights
      are due and no compensation shall be paid to anyone on account of the
      Demerging Company.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Toekenning van Voordelen</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Benefits
      granted</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ter
      gelegenheid van de splitsing zullen er geen voordelen aan bestuurders of
      commissarissen van de Vennootschappen of aan anderen betrokken bij de
      splitsing worden toegekend.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">No
      benefits shall be granted to managing directors or members of the
      supervisory board of the Companies or to others on occasion of the
      demerger.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>

      Samenstelling van de Raad van Bestuur van de Verkrijgende
      Vennootschap</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Management
      board of the Acquiring Company</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 24pt; TEXT-INDENT: -24pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Thans
      bestaat de raad van bestuur van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap
      uit:</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 24pt; TEXT-INDENT: -24pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 40pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Gerrit

                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 40pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Johan van Hall, geboren te Baarn op 24 februari 1960; en</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 40pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Christiaan Franciscus Henricus Herman Vogelzang, geboren te Haarlem op 28
      november 1962.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8.1.&#160;&#160;
      At present the management board of the Acquiring Company is constituted as
      follows:</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 48pt; TEXT-INDENT: -28pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Gerrit
      Zalm, born in Enkhuizen, the Netherlands on 6 May 1952;</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 38pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Johan van Hall, born in Baarn, the Netherlands on 24 February 1960;
      and</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 40pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Christiaan Franciscus Henricus Herman Vogelzang, born in Haarlem, the
      Netherlands on 28 November 1962.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8.2&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Er bestaat het voornemen na de Nederlandse Splitsing wijziging te brengen
      in de samenstelling van de raad van bestuur van de Verkrijgende
      Vennootschap. De samenstelling van de raad van bestuur zal dan
      worden:</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 40pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Javier Maldonado Trinchant, geboren te Madrid, Spanje, op 11 juli
      1962;</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 40pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 40pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Jeroen
      Joseph Marie Kremers, geboren te Doornspijk, op 8 november
      1958;</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 40pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Brian
      David Stevenson, geboren te Lewes, Sussex, Verenigd&#160;&#160;Koninkrijk,
      op 11 november 1953;</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 20pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">8.2&#160;&#160;
      The composition of the management board of the Acquiring Company shall be
      amended on occasion of the Dutch Demerger demerger. The composition of the
      management board shall then be as follows:</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -41pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 40pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Javier
      Maldonado Trinchant, born in Madrid, Spain, on 11 July 1962;</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 40pt; TEXT-INDENT: -20pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Jeroen
      Joseph Marie Kremers, born in Doornspijk, the Netherlands, on 8 November
      1958;</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -16pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Brian
      David Stevenson, born in Lewes, Sussex, United Kingdom, on 11 November
      1953;</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>

                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Samenstelling

                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Composition of the&#160;&#160;Supervisory Board of
      the&#160;&#160;&#160;Acquiring Company</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">9.1&#160;&#160;
      Thans heeft de Verkrijgende Vennootschap geen raad van commissarissen. Ter
      gelegenheid van de Nederlandse Splitsing zal echter een raad van
      commissarissen worden ingesteld die dan zal bestaan uit de volgende
      personen:</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

      At present the Acquiring Company does not have a supervisory board.
      However at the occasion of the Dutch Demerger a supervisory board shall be
      established which shall then be constituted as follows:</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font>

      1946;</font></div>

                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font>

                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Trude

                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(f)&#160;&#160;

      </font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Arthur
      Caulfield Martinez, born in New York, United States of America, on 25
      September 1939;</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Andries
      Arij Olijslager, born in Terneuzen, the Netherlands, on 1 January
      1944;</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(d)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Gert
      Jan Kramer, born in Heemstede, the Netherlands, on 20 June
      1942;</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(e)&#160;
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ana
      Maria Llopis Rivas, born in Cumana-Sucre, Venezuela on 5 May
      1950;</font></div>

                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(f)&#160;

      Rodriquez Inciarte, born in Oviedo, Spain, on 27 June 1952;</font></div>

</font></font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(h)
      <font id="TAB2" size="3" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ronald
      Teerlink, born in Loosdrecht, the Netherlands, on 28 January 1961;
      </font></font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(i)&#160;&#160;
      <font id="TAB2" size="3" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">David
      Alan Cole, geboren in Atlanta, Verenigde Staten van Amerika, op 2 oktober
      1961. </font></font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(i)&#160;&#160;
      <font id="TAB2" size="3" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">David
      Alan Cole, born in Atlanta, United States of America, on 2 October
      1961.</font></font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%" style="PADDING-LEFT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">10.2
      Er bestaat geen voornemen na de splitsing wijziging te brengen in de
      samenstelling van de Raad van Bestuur van de Splitsende
      Vennootschap.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">10.2
      The composition of the management board of the Demerging Company shall not
      be amended on occasion of the
demerger.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>

                </td>

      Thans bestaat de raad van commissarissen van de Splitsende Vennootschap
      uit:</font></div>

      Caulfield Martinez, geboren te New York, Verenigde Staten van Amerika, op
      25 september 1939;</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;

      Arij Olijslager, geboren te Terneuzen, op 1 januari 1944;</font></div>

      At present the supervisory board of the Demerging Company is constituted
      as follows:</font></div>

      Albertine Maas-de Brouwer, born in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, on 28

      Caulfield Martinez, born in New York, United States of America, on 25

      Arij Olijslager, born in Terneuzen, the Netherlands, on 1 January

      </font>

                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(h)&#160;

      1949.</font></div>

      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Miller

      1949.</font></div>
                </td>

                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">11.2
      Er bestaat geen voornemen na de splitsing wijziging te brengen in de
      samenstelling van de raad van commissarissen van de Splitsende
      Vennootschap.</font></div>
                </td>
