                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">11.2</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      composition of the supervisory board of the Demerging Company shall not be
      amended on occasion of the demerger.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">12.&#160;
      Tijdstip verantwoording&#160;&#160;financi&#235;le gegevens</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">12.&#160;
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Effective
      financial date</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">De
      financi&#235;le gegevens van de af te splitsen activa en passiva van de
      Splitsende Vennootschap zullen met ingang van de eerste dag van de maand
      waarin de splitsing wordt ge&#235;ffectueerd worden verantwoord in de
      jaarstukken of andere financi&#235;le verantwoording van de Verkrijgende
      Vennootschap.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      financial particulars of the assets and liabilities of the Demerging
      Company that will be split off shall be reflected in the annual accounts
      or other financial reports of the Acquiring Company as per the first day
      of the month in which the demerger is effectuated.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">13.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Maatregelen
      in verband met het verkrijgen van het aandeelhouderschap in de
      Verkrijgende Vennootschap</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">13.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Measures
      in connection with shareholding in Demerging Company</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ter
      gelegenheid van de splitsing zal aan de Aandeelhouder 1 aandeel in het
      kapitaal van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap worden
toegekend.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">On
      occasion of the demerger, the Acquiring Company shall allot 1 share in its
      share capital to the Shareholder.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">14.&#160;
      Activiteiten van de Splitsende Vennootschap</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">14.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Activities
      of the Demerging Company</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">De
      activiteiten van de Splitsende Vennootschap worden voortgezet door
      de</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      activities of the Demerging Company shall be continued by the Acquiring
      </font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>

            </div>

              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>

        <div>&#160;</div>
        <div align="left">
          <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Verkrijgende
      Vennootschap, voor zover het betreft die ten aanzien van de af te splitsen
      vermogensbestanddelen.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Company,
      to the extent those activities relate to the assets and liabilities to be
      transferred to the Acquiring Company.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">15.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Goedkeuring
      van het besluit tot splitsing</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">15.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Approval
      of resolution to enter into demerger</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.1
      Overeenkomstig hetgeen is bepaald in Artikel 19 van de statuten van de
      Splitsende Vennootschap is het bestuursbesluit betreffende het voorstel de
      splitsing aan te gaan onderworpen aan de voorafgaande goedkeuring van de
      algemene vergadering van aandeelhouders van de Splitsende
      Vennootschap.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.1
      In accordance with article 19 of the articles of association of the
      Demerging Company the board resolution to propose to enter into the
      demerger requires the prior approval of the general meeting of
      shareholders of the Demerging Company.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.2
      Het voorstel tot splitsing is goedgekeurd door de raad van commissarissen
      van de Splitsende Vennootschap op 29 september 2009.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.2
      The demerger proposal was approved by the supervisory board of the
      Demerging Company on 29 September 2009.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.3
      Het besluit tot splitsing is onderworpen aan goedkeuring van De
      Nederlandsche Bank.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">15.3
      The resolution to enter into the demerger requires approval of the Dutch
      Central Bank.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">16.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Goodwill
      en uitkeerbare reserves van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">16.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Goodwill
      and distributable reserves of the Acquiring Company</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">16.1
      De uitkeerbare reserves van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap nemen als gevolg
      van de splitsing toe met </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">veertien
      miljoen euro (&#8364;&#160;14.000.000). De uitkeerbare reserves van de
      Splitsende Vennootschap nemen af met veertien miljoen euro
      (&#8364;&#160;14.000.000).</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">16.1
      The distributable reserves of the Acquiring Company will as a result of
      the demerger increase by an amount of fourteen million euro
      (&#8364;&#160;14,000,000). The distributable reserves of the Demerging Company
      will decrease by an amount of fourteen million euro
      (&#8364;&#160;14,000,000).</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

      </font>

                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Er
      zijn geen gevolgen ten aanzien van de goodwill.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

      </font>

                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -36pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">There
      are no consequences with respect to the goodwill.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">De
      ingevolge artikel 2:334y van het Burgerlijk Wetboek aanvullend te
      vermelden gegevens zijn de volgende:</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      information which has to be made additionally available pursuant to
      Section&#160;2:334y of the Dutch Civil Code is the
    following:</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">17.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">De
      ruilverhouding van de aandelen en de omvang van de betalingen</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">17.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">The
      share exchange ratio and the amount of payments</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.1
      Ter gelegenheid van de splitsing zal 1 aandeel in het kapitaal van de
      Verkrijgende Vennootschap met een nominale waarde van &#8364;&#160;1,--,
      genummerd 500.000.000, aan de Aandeelhouder worden toegekend. De
      ruilverhouding bedraagt derhalve een toekenning van 1 aandeel in het
      kapitaal van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap tegen verkrijging door de
      Verkrijgende Vennootschap van de vermogensbestanddelen zoals opgenomen in
      <font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Bijlage 5<font style="TEXT-DECORATION: none">.</font></font></font></font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.1
      On the occasion of the demerger 1 share in the share capital of the
      Acquiring Company, having a nominal value of &#8364; 1, numbered 500,000,000,
      shall be allotted to the Shareholder. The exchange ratio therefore is an
      allotment of 1 share in the share capital of the Acquiring Company in
      exchange for the acquisition by the Acquiring Company of the assets and
      liabilities as referred to in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;5</font>.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.2
      De Aandeelhouder heeft ingestemd met het buiten toepassing laten van
      artikel 2:334aa leden 1 en 3 van het Burgerlijk Wetboek, zulks
      overeenkomstig artikel 2:334aa lid 7 van het Burgerlijk
      Wetboek.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.2
      The Shareholders has agreed to not apply Section 2:334aa paragraphs 1 and
      3 of the Dutch Civil Code, such in accordance with Section 2:334aa
      paragraph 7 of the Dutch Civil Code.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.3
      Het verschil tussen de waarde van het gedeelte van het vermogen van de
      Splitsende </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Vennootschap
      dat de Verkrijgende Vennootschap bij de splitsing zal verkrijgen en de
      nominale waarde van het toe te kennen aandeel, zal als agio worden
      geboekt.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.3
      The difference between the value of that part of the assets and
      liabilities of the Demerging Company which will be acquired by the
      Acquiring Company as a result of the demerger and the nominal value of the
      share to be allocated will be booked as share
  premium.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>

        <div align="left">
          <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.4
      Ter gelegenheid van de splitsing zullen krachtens de ruilverhouding geen
      betalingen plaatsvinden.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">17.4
      No payments shall be made pursuant to the exchange ratio at the occasion
      of the demerger.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">18.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Tijdstip
      met ingang waarvan en welke mate waarin de Aandeelhouder zal gaan delen in
      de winst van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">18.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">the
      date as of which and extent to which the Shareholder will participate in
      the profits of the Acquiring company</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">De
      Aandeelhouder zal vanaf de eerste dag van de maand waarin de splitsing
      wordt ge&#235;ffectueerd, gelijkelijk met de thans reeds in het kapitaal van de
      Verkrijgende Vennootschap gehouden aandelen, volledig delen in dat deel
      van de winst van de Verkrijgende Vennootschap dat verband houdt met de af
      te splitsen vermogensbestanddelen.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Shareholder will, equally with the shares it already holds in the share
      capital of the Acquiring Company, fully participate in the that part of
      the profits of the Acquiring Company which relates to the assets and
      liabilities to be demerged as from the first day of the month in which the
      demerger is effectuated.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">19.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">Het
      aantal aandelen dat zal worden ingetrokken</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">19.
      </font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 4pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps">the
      number of shares to be cancelled</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Geen.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">None.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Dit
      voorstel tot splitsing komt tot stand zodra het rechtsgeldig is
      ondertekend door alle bestuurders en commissarissen. Het is niet vereist
      dat alle ondertekenaars hetzelfde exemplaar van dit voorstel tot splitsing
      tekenen. Indien ondertekening op verschillende exemplaren van dit voorstel
      tot splitsing geschiedt, vormen de desbetreffende exemplaren tezamen &#233;&#233;n
      voorstel tot splitsing.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">This
      demerger proposal will come into effect, when legally signed by all
      members of the management board and the supervisory board. It is not
      required that all signatories sign the same copy of this demerger
      proposal. In case the signing will take place on multiple copies of this
      demerger proposal, these multiple copies together will constitute one
      demerger proposal.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Te
      ondertekenen door alle leden van de raden van bestuur van de
      Vennootschappen en de raad van commissarissen van de Splitsende
      Vennootschap.</font></div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="49%">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">To
      be signed by all managing directors of the Companies and the members of
      the supervisory board of the Demerging
Company.</font></div>
                </td>
              </tr>
          </table>
        </div>
